meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #971.

td.p: Barbara Bradley, a teacher from Glendale, Arizona
Dennis McNeil, a priest from Painesville, Ohio
Steve Brown, a chief petty officer from Twentynine Palms, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,799)

tr.td: POETRY
FAMOUS WOMEN
SPORTS
DOUBLE LETTERS
THE FUNNIES
MARS
